title: FLT-Coq: Two Conditional Routes to Fermat’s Last Theorem (Coverage Parameter and GN(2))
description:
Coq formalization of two conditional routes to Fermat’s Last Theorem (FLT):
Track A — Coverage parameter (global normalizer o>1 with maximum coverage);
Track B — Explicit base GN(2).

Scope note: each track assumes its own extra premise (not proven here) and verifies
in Coq that FLT follows as a consequence under that assumption. The repository is
reproducible (Docker/CI) and enforces a no-Admitted policy.

Files: FLT_new.v (GN(2)), FLT_old.v (Coverage parameter). PDFs are under new/ and old/.

Corresponding author: GLDedenko@fa.ru
